Auto Accept needs to modify your {0} sho: Auto Accept needs to modify your {0} shortcut to enable connection. This adds the "--remote-debugging-port" flag so the extension can see the IDE.
Please close and restart {0} completely: Please close and restart {0} completely to apply changes.
Auto Accept: Could not configure automat: Auto Accept: Could not configure automatically. Please add --remote-debugging-port=9000 to your {0} shortcut manually, then restart.
Background Mode allows Auto Accept to wo: Background Mode allows Auto Accept to work across ALL browser tabs simultaneously, even when they're not focused. This is a Pro feature.
Pending enable flag detected - auto-enab: Pending enable flag detected - auto-enabling Auto Accept
Troubleshooting: This error occurs when:
Troubleshooting: This error occurs when the extension cannot find or modify your IDE shortcut. Common causes:
1. The shortcut is not in a standard location
2. You don't have write permission to the shortcut
3. The IDE was installed in a non-standard way

Manual fix: Right-click your IDE shortcut → Properties → Target, add --remote-debugging-port=9000 after the .exe path.
